org.firebirdsql.jdbc
Interface FirebirdSavepoint

All Superinterfaces:
java.sql.Savepoint
All Known Implementing Classes:
FBSavepoint
Deprecated. This interface will be removed in Jaybird 2.3, switch to Savepoint 

@Deprecated
public interface FirebirdSavepoint
extends java.sql.Savepoint

Savepoint interface, corresponds to the java.sql.Savepoint interface defined in JDBC 3.0, but can be used in JDBC 2.0 applications.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface java.sql.Savepoint
getSavepointId, getSavepointName
